name: RaspiRoverDuino
body: RaspiRoverDuino ============ Dagu5 + Arduino + Raspberry Pi ============ Hardware Dagu Rover 5 Tracked Chassis with Encoders Dagu - 4 Channel DC Motor Controller with Encoder Support Expansion Plate RaspBerry PI Model B USB - WiFI - NetGear 150N RaspiCam Pan Tilt Cam Arduino UNO R3 ============ HW Configuration Arduino Channel
